wikitext.*:
'''Nodens Books''' is a publishing firm established by [[Douglas A. Anderson]] in [[2012]].

The firm is named after the [[Celtic]] god [[Wikipedia:Nodens|Nodens]], about which [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote an etymological essay (see: ''[[The Name 'Nodens']]'').
==Publications, selected==
Publications related to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]:

*[[2012]]: ''[[The Saga of Hrolf Kraki]]'', translated and edited by Stella M. Mills; Foreword by [[Priscilla Tolkien]]
*201?: ''Medieval Tales Before Tolkien'', edited by Douglas A. Anderson
